short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SureVoIP Call and SMS Browser Add-on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The SureVoIP Browser Extension allows SureVoIP customers to click to call any number on a webpage and send an SMS message. It is powered by the SureVoIP API - http://www.surevoip.co.uk/api with more information available at http://www.surevoip.co.uk/addons
